name: APPLETALE 2
description:
APPLETALE 2 is a platformer game which looks simple, but it is really hard.

There are 9 different types of apples which give you different effects.
There are effects that help your gameplay but there are a few ones that affect your gameplay negatively.
You have to use these effects to go through the levels.

The game consists of two game modes:

Campaign: 20 singleplayer levels

CO-OP: 10 two-player levels

If you like rage games then this game is definitely for you. What are you waiting for? It's free.
